(Program 
  (Statement 
    (Arg 
      (Primary 
        (Lhs 
          (Nil "nil"))))) 
  (Statement 
    (Arg 
      (Primary 
        (Lhs 
          (Variable 
            (Self "self")))))) 
  (Statement 
    (Arg 
      (Primary 
        (Lhs 
          (False "false"))))) 
  (Statement 
    (Arg 
      (Primary 
        (Lhs 
          (True "true"))))))
